title: Azerbaijan grants visa-free travel to Omani citizens for one year
summary_full: Omani nationals can now travel to Azerbaijan visa-free for short stays under a temporary one-year exemption. Starting February 15, 2026, Omani citizens can enter Azerbaijan for up to 30 days per visit, with a maximum of three visits allowed. This initiative aims to boost tourism and strengthen bilateral relations between the two nations.
